name: GoodBlocks by Projects Engine
author: Projects Engine

sections.description:
GoodBlocks by Projects Engine is packed with features to supercharge your WordPress website. Whether you’re looking to create eye-catching call-to-action sections, design intricate layouts, or add unique interactive elements, GoodBlocks has you covered. Each block is crafted with flexibility in mind, making it easy to adjust styles, colors, and settings to suit your needs.

Support

For support, please visit our support page.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. See GPL-2.0 for details.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from the GoodBlocks by Projects Engine website.
  2. In your WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin.
  3. Upload the goodblocks.zip file and click Install Now.
  4. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  5. Start creating with GoodBlocks in the Gutenberg editor.
sections.faq:
What version of WordPress is required?

GoodBlocks requires WordPress version 6.5 or higher.

What version of PHP is required?

GoodBlocks requires PHP version 7.4 or higher.

How do I use GoodBlocks?

After activation, go to any page or post in the Gutenberg editor. Click the Add Block button (+) and look for the GoodBlocks category. Select the desired block and customize it using the block settings panel.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Improved block performance and stability.
  • Added new customization options for existing blocks.
  • Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

1.1.0

  • Initial release with a full set of customizable Gutenberg blocks.

short_description: GoodBlocks is a powerful plugin designed to enhance your Gutenberg editor experience with a wide variety of customizable and versatile blocks.
